name: Eira
description:
The story of the game tells a world called "Kauldron". A girl named "Rui" just turned 15 years old, she encountered a lot of difficulties after inheriting the magic shop from her grandmother "Eira". All you have to do is to help Rui make choices and deal with life's problems. Of course, these choices will lead to different endings.

● Interacting with different people to increase goodwill.
Player will play the heroine "Rui". In addition to running the magic shop, she also need to explore unknown areas, interact with other people and help them resolving problems.



● Learn more about the character's story through various commissions and request.
In the world of "Kauldron", Rui may meet different people, receive various commissions, and even get involved in event of other people. By these way, Rui will learn more stories form each character.



● Get some materials by exploring outside, mining and fishing.
In order to run a magic shop, "Rui" can't only interact with others, but also enhance its own abilities through other activities, Such as collecting materials, conducting business trade, cultivating crops, and raising livestocks, etc. These activities can enhance the abilities of Rui to deal with problems easier in life.



● Research in alchemy by blending items.
The collected items can be sold directly in magic shops. ofcourse, you can als used them as materials for research in "Alchemy" and " Make treasures items". You may invent new items or make more powerful items through these activities.



● Pick up your weapon to protect yourself when encountering enemies.
During exploration or events, it is inevitable that you will encounter attacks from monsters or hostile forces. Rui must resolve these crises by her battle skills. Of course, if you have delved into the field of "demon theory", you can also summon powerful demon gods to fight or assist yourself.
